content.rendered:
The E10 is an easy to transport micro-excavator ideal to go through most standard door sizes.

The retractable undercarriage ensures unmatched stability for this size of machine, while retracting easily to allow the excavator to pass through narrow openings. Combined with the integrated, foldable TOPS, it means that 710 mm wide, low-headroom openings are no barrier to this model.

This machine packs a big punch, whether used for demolition, construction or landscaping work. Thanks to the Zero Tail Swing, this excavator is less likely to get damaged while working, thus providing a longer service life and lower total cost of ownership.

Low noise and vibration levels ensure excellent operator comfort along with reduced environmental impact. The unique adjustable joystick controls on the E10 take comfort to unequalled levels.

This model includes the 2 speed as standard (up to 3.1 km/h) to quickly transport materials.

The E10 is a true Zero Tail Swing, which means the operator can fully concentrate on the job on hand.

 

E10 Compact Excavator Brochure

excerpt.rendered:
E10, operate comfortably where larger machines can not fit

  • Zero Tail Swing (ZTS) design for extra peace of mind
  • Unique adjustable hydraulic joystick controls for comfortable and more precise operation
  • 2 speed operation for faster repositioning
  • Powerful hydraulics for professional applications
  • Retractable undercarriage for increased stability
